theAdventurer:RipostePower.NAME: Riposte
DESCRIPTIONS: Until the start of your turn, deal this much damage back when attacked.

DESCRIPTIONS: Causes Echo effects to trigger.

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
temporary strength at the start of your turn.

theAdventurer:BleedingEdgePower.NAME: Bleeding Edge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy, apply #b
#pIchor to them.

theAdventurer:AccretionDiskPower.NAME: Accretion Disk
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn add a Pulsar to your hand.

theAdventurer:IchorFloodPower.NAME: Ichor Flood
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn apply #b
#pIchor to each enemy.

theAdventurer:SingularityPower.NAME: Singularity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b
Constricted to each enemy.

theAdventurer:InstinctPower.NAME: Instinct
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn gain block equal to your #yMadness.

theAdventurer:AdaptivePower.NAME: Adaptive
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card, gain #b
#yVigor.

theAdventurer:AlignmentPower.NAME: Conjunction
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards cost #b
less energy to play on the turn they are drawn, to a minimum of one.

theAdventurer:MalignantGrowthPower.NAME: Malignant
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
temporary HP and reduce Malignant by 1.

theAdventurer:StarForgePower.NAME: Star Forge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card, deal #b
damage to ALL enemies.

theAdventurer:WeepingWoundPower.NAME: Weeping
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Status, exhaust it and apply #b
#pIchor to All enemies.

theAdventurer:ElderFormPower.NAME: Elder Form
DESCRIPTIONS: When you deal unblocked attack damage, the enemy temporarily loses strength equal to the damage dealt
times.

theAdventurer:RuinPower.NAME: Ruin
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Constricted at the start of your turn.

theAdventurer:MadnessPower.NAME: Madness
DESCRIPTIONS: Equal to the difference between your maximum hand size and the number of cards currently in your hand.

theAdventurer:WeakNextTurnPower.NAME: Weak Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b

theAdventurer:Frozen.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal and receive 25% less damage.
